name: Quiet Valley 2
description:
Everyone in this town is dead but you. What happened here? Uncover the horrors of the town of Quiet Valley by exploring the various locations and deciding whether or not this is all just in your head. This game is presented in a skewed/distorted 2.5D first-person perspective. Play at your own risk. May cause some players headaches.

-KEYBOARD/MOUSE CONTROLS-
[WASD]/[ARROWS] - Move
[MOUSE] - Look
[SHIFT] - Sprint
[LMB] - Interact
[RMB] - Flashlight
[SCROLL] - Change Items
[Q] - View Map
[ESC] - Pause/Exit

-GAMEPAD CONTROLS-
[D-PAD]/[LEFT ANALOG] - Move
[RIGHT ANALOG] - Look
[LEFT STICK] - Sprint
[A]/[X] - Interact
[Y]/[▲] - Flashlight
[LT/RT] - Change Items
[BACK/SELECT] - View Map
[START] - Pause/Exit

Keyboard and mouse recommended.
